description:
Kizuki, who Mizuho saw as the crybaby little brother of the group, has lately been hitting on her. Since Mizuho believed her and Kizuki would be childhood friends forever, she is not sure how to approach this situation. He`s on her mind to the point where she seems disoriented, and even says something that could potentially push Kizuki away.
Source: Crunchyroll
